name: Super Pole Jumper
description:
Super Pole Jumper is a precision platformer where you play as a green bird that jumps on poles. The objective is to make it to the end of the stage. This game will probably be pretty tough for the average platform-gamer -- you have been warned!

This is a VERY early version from what I want it to become. I hope you'll like it!

The controls are listed in the read me contained in the zip file.

Leave your thoughts in the comments.
